WorkItem.ClosedComment: Sounds like you worked it out - please reactivate if I misread. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
Actually the issue was following:

i have already generated a js file from ts with --sourcemap.

Now in a post build event i was trying to generate a declaration file. The compiler saves a new js file and a d.ts. I did not specify -- sourcemap in the post build event.

I was wrongly assuming that when --declaration is specified, ONLY the declaration d.ts is generated.
WorkItem.Summary: (My error) typescript is not adding //@ sourceMappingURL=xxx
